entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 17.
